DataElement.preferredDefinition: The month, day, and year the secondary malignancy occurred.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Derived as a result of a primary condition; not direct or immediate; of second rank or importance or value._A tumor composed of atypical neoplastic, often pleomorphic cells that invade other tissues. Malignant neoplasms often metastasize to distant anatomic sites and may recur after excision. The most common malignant neoplasms are carcinomas (adenocarcinomas or squamous cell carcinomas), Hodgkin and non-Hodgkin lymphomas, leukemias, melanomas, and sarcomas._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Derived as a result of a primary condition; not direct or immediate; of second rank or importance or value.:A tumor composed of atypical neoplastic, often pleomorphic cells that invade other tissues.  Malignant neoplasms usually metastasize to distant anatomic sites and may recur after excision.  The most common malignant neoplasms are carcinomas (adenocarcinomas or squamous cell carcinomas), Hodgkin's and non-Hodgkin's lymphomas, leukemias, melanomas, and sarcomas. -- 2004

Concepts.definition: Derived as a result of a primary condition; not direct or immediate; of second rank or importance or value.

A neoplasm composed of atypical neoplastic, often pleomorphic cells that invade other tissues. Malignant neoplasms often metastasize to distant anatomic sites and may recur after excision. The most common malignant neoplasms are carcinomas, Hodgkin and non-Hodgkin lymphomas, leukemias, melanomas, and sarcomas.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

ReferenceDocuments.description: PerformedObservation.dateRange WHERE PerformedObservation > PerformedDiagnosis.value [new] "malignancy including PTLD and EBV" AND PerformedObservation.dateRange IS GREATER THAN PerformedSubstanceAdministration.dateRange AND PerformedSubstanceAdministration > DefinedSubstanceAdministration.nameCode = "Perform Overall Hematopoetic Stem Cell Transplantation" AND PerformedSubstanceAdministration > PerformedDiagnosis.value [first] = "malignancy including PTLD and EBV"
